frontMatter.title: Module 1: The Robotic Nervous System - ROS 2
frontMatter.description: Mastering the middleware that makes modern humanoid robots think and move
objectives: Understand why ROS 2 is the de-facto robotic operating system
Master nodes, topics, services, and actions
Bridge Python AI agents with real ROS 2 controllers using rclpy
Model any humanoid robot using URDF/Xacro
